description:
For ski mountaineers who prize lightness above all, need look no further than the F1 XT. It uses carbon reinforcements in the frame to provide stiffness and power transfer, while offering progressive flex. The manual ski/walk mechanism is quick and reliable, and the pivot point is further under foot to increase the efficiency of your stride. These boots unite powerhouse performance with technical touring.

  • 3D Lambda Frame improves stiffness and torsion resistance while reducing the thickness of the shell for a minimum weight
  • Grilamid LFT® Shell is made from Long Fiber Technology and reinforced with long carbon fibers that enhance resistance and rigidity
  • Wave Lite closure system uses a self-equalizing cable and a single buckle for a secure fit
  • Speed Lock LT ski/walk mechanism offers friction-free touring efficiency with downhill performance
  • Range of motion in walk mode is 72 degrees for a natural and effortless movement
  • Power Strap Lite closure offers support and eliminates rebound from the top of the boot
  • Tour LT2 closed-cell foam liner is thermoformable for a custom fit
  • Flex index is 110
  • Recco® reflector in power strap can be detected by rescue crews in many ski areas. Not a substitute for avalanche transceiver and appropriate knowledge when travelling in the backcountry
name: Scarpa F1 XT Ski Boots - Unisex
